Raphael Evangelista é redator do BuzzFeed, em São Paulo. Contact Raphael Evangelista at raphael.evangelista@buzzfeed.com . Ryan Broderick is a reporter for BuzzFeed News and is based in London. Contact Ryan Broderick at ryan@buzzfeed.com .
